entry.title: Snowshoe Under the Stars & Après at the Hockey Canada Cabin - January 22
entry.summary:
Vendor: Predator Ridge Resort
Type: Tickets-1M
Price: 70.23

January is a great time to connect. Connect with friends, connect with nature and connect to yourself.  Join us for a guided one-hour evening snowshoe tour, followed by an intimate social après with all of the comforts of winter at the Hockey Canada Cabin. 

DETAILS:
DATE: Saturday, January 22, 2022
TIME: 4:30pm - 8:00pm
COST: $56.25/person + tax + grat=$70.23
INCLUDES: one-hour guided tour, chili, deluxe smores and bailey's

Due to COVID-19 restrictions, there are only 10 tickets available. Advanced online ticket purchase is required. As per current BC PHO restrictions, guests must remain seated and will not be able to move between or visit other tables at the Hockey Canada Cabin. Standing and mingling will not be permitted. Please note this event adheres to all current BC PHO restrictions.

entry.title: Craft & Sip - January 29
entry.summary:
Vendor: Predator Ridge Resort
Type: Tickets-1M
Price: 75.42

Enjoy a new limited program at Predator Ridge aimed at sparking your creativity.  These classes are great fun for singles, couples or a great gift for your favourite creative genius!

Proof of vaccination and masks are required. We are only allowing 10 students per class, so space is extremely limited! Do you want to be added to the waitlist for additional Craft & Sip classes? Please email jgluska@predatorridge.com

CRAFT & SIP CLASS DETAILS

Create unique mixed media artwork and enjoy the freedom to explore and learn about art materials. This class is led by creative educator, Meghan Budd who inspires people to connect to self-expression and creativity. Enjoy a glass of wine while you create and take your creations home with you.

DATE: Saturday, January 29, 2022
TIME: 1:00pm - 4:00pm
WHERE: Lower level of Clubhouse
COST: $70.35 + tax + grat = $75.42/person 

ABOUT THIS WORKSHOP

Using a variety of creative processes and materials each person will create a unique mixed media artwork. This workshop provides time for you to enjoy the freedom to explore and learn about art materials. To gain clarity, we consider what we would like to attract into our lives and embody those intentions in our artwork. Focusing on goals and setting positive intentions can inspire us to take action on the things that are important to us. Let your creativity flow, there are no rules and no experience required.

ABOUT MEGHAN BUDD

Meghan Budd is a creative educator who inspires people to connect to self-expression and creativity. She promotes well-being through visual art, believing that creativity is a way to feel connected with ourselves and others. Through explorations with art materials, Meghan guides her students to follow intuition and go with the flow while creating. In her workshops, the focus is on process rather than product, allowing students to become more open to possibilities. Arts-based processes support people in mindfully connecting to the present moment, through the sensory system.

Meghan has a Bachelor of Media Arts from Emily Carr University and a Bachelor of Education from the University of British Columbia. Her artist practice includes training and experience in photography, media arts, fine arts and education. Integrating her passion for creativity with a love of teaching, Meghan has worked with people of all ages. She passionately teaches mindful art practice at yoga and wellness retreats as well as many other community workshops.

I am passionate about cultivating creativity, curiosity, and connection through my art classes. My workshops provide a fun and welcoming space where participants create freely and joyfully, learning as they  play. Students engage in art making and enjoy the freedom to explore. I empower people of all ages to follow their intuition and immerse in the experience of creating, with little emphasis on the end result. Your journey in life and art is uniquely yours. Open your heart to self-expression and connect to creativity.

entry.title: Italian Sauces & Pizza Class - January 27
entry.summary:
Vendor: Predator Ridge Resort
Type: Tickets-1M
Price: 136.29

Led by our team of award-winning chefs, we're delighted to bring back another month of our popular series of cooking classes.  These intimate classes are great fun for singles, couples or a great gift for your favourite foodie!

Proof of vaccination and masks are required. We are only allowing 10 students per class, so space is extremely limited!

ITALIAN SAUCES & PIZZA CLASS DETAILS

Learn the art of Italian Sauces & Pizza with Chef Nigel King from Range Lounge & Grill. Enjoy wine while you cook and take your creations home with you.

DATE: Thursday, January 27, 2022
TIME: 4:00pm - 6:00pm
COST: $110 + tax + grat = $136.29/person

CLASSIC FRENCH COOKING CLASS DETAILS

entry.title: Gin Cocktail Class - January 28
entry.summary:
Vendor: Predator Ridge Resort
Type: Tickets-1M
Price: 49.56

Learn how to make cocktails like a pro, with our popular series of cocktail classes with our mixologists Samer Dawood & Jesse Sarich.  

GIN COCKTAIL CLASS DETAILS

Learn bartending techniques and how to make up to 3 different Gin based cocktails. During this class you will enjoy a welcome cocktail, a hands on demonstration including sampling of each drink. Under the guidance of our mixologists, you will then make your own cocktail and take home a recipe book afterwards. 

DATE: Friday, January 28, 2022
TIME: 4:00pm - 6:00pm
COST: $40 + tax + grat = $49.56/person
WHERE: Range Lounge & Grill

These intimate classes are great fun for singles, couples or a great gift!

Space is extremely limited!  Only 8 students per class allowed.  Masks and proof of vaccination is mandatory to attend this event.

entry.title: Wednesday Wine Flights
entry.summary:
Vendor: Predator Ridge Resort
Type: Tickets-1M
Price: 13.13

Our popular weekly wine tasting events continue this winter with our popular Wednesday Wine Flights events. 

EVENT DETAILS
DATES: Every Wednesday
TIME: 4:30pm - 5:30pm
WHERE: Range Lounge & Grill
COST: $12.50/person + tax = $13.13/person 

Advanced online ticket purchase is required. Tickets are limited to 30 per tasting. 

    Like all dining experiences at Predator Ridge, we are committed to adhering all current COVID-19 protocols as directed by the BC Provincial Health Officer. Proof of vaccination is mandatory to participate in our wine tastings at Range Lounge & Grill. + Click here to read our COVID-19 protocols.
